title: Research-Based Autism Intervention
description: We integrate modern, evidence-based therapy practices.
content:
Science meets Compassion. High-quality, evidence-based care.

The field of autism treatment is filled with varying advice and methodologies. At Maryam Child Development Studio, we cut through the noise by strictly adhering to Research-Based Interventions. This means every therapy, every strategy, and every tool we use is backed by scientific evidence proving its effectiveness.

Our Core Frameworks

Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA)

Recognized globally as the most effective treatment for autism, ABA helps us understand how behavior works and how real-life learning takes place.

Early Start Denver Model (ESDM)

For our younger students (toddlers and preschoolers), we utilize principles from ESDM, a play-based, relationship-focused approach that integrates ABA with developmental psychology. It feels like play to the child but is deeply therapeutic.

Sensory Integration (Ayres Sensory Integration)

We follow established protocols to assess and treat sensory processing disorders, ensuring that interventions are targeted and safe.

Picture Exchange Communication System (PECS)

A rigorous, evidence-based protocol to teach functional communication to non-verbal learners.

Continuous Learning

Our team engages in continuous professional development. We stay updated with the latest journals and clinical trials ensuring that families in Hyderabad have access to world-class, modern autism care.

When you choose Maryam Studio, you are choosing a center that values integrity, data, and results.
